CatDescriptText: Rev. B. F. Wright, Holiday Memorial AME Zion Church, Braddock was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think common-law marriage should be outlawed?" Answer reads: "I definitely think that common law marriage should be outlawed. I've always said that the state condoning it, encouragement is given to this form of immoral living."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Reverend B. F. Wright wearing trench coat, moustache, and eyeglasses, standing on sidewalk with buildings, automobiles, large sign, and hillside with trees in background
